thread.title: Tim Bennion
thread.title_full: Trade Tested reviewed by Tim Bennion

author: Tim Bennion
title: Tim Bennion
text:
I have used it regularly for the last three months or so and have found it to be more than adequate.
I purchased it as I had a need for an additional multi-positional ladder but was unable to get a five rung ladder the same as my original one.
The advantages I have found with the Atom is the ease of operation and positivity of the locking pins, and the absence of locking arms at mid-height required when at full ‘A’ frame extension ( something that is present and restricting on other makes ).
The ladder gives the impression of robustness, which is borne out by the handling and knocks that it has already received.
I have happily endorsed the product and your business to others since purchasing the ladder.
Kind regards
Tim
